name: NeonDisk
description:
Is your life lacking fun things to throw?

Have you dreamed of being able to throw discs at people at destroy them?

If you can't afford a therapist, then this is the game for you!

NeonDisk is a short, Tron inspired game designed for the Oculus Quest 2. Consisting of 4 small levels, with a wide array of 3 different enemy types, you'll be sure to get at least 10 minutes worth of fun!

Created in all of 3 weeks, NeonDisk is sure to fulfill at least 1 of your gaming desires. And you'll probably still enjoy it, even if it doesn't!
